column1: Smoque BBQ////A small group stopped in for takeout (thank goodness
column2: because at 8PM on a Tuesday night
column3: every table was still filled!).  I had the Brisket and a side of slaw.  It was as delicious as I expected.  I don't know if I would eat there
column4: as it's pretty small and very crowded with the line winding right through the middle of the dining area
